title: Twitter is turning into X. Analysts don’t see the treasure map.
description: In changing Twitter’s iconic blue logo, owner Elon Musk is trading a bird in the hand for the promise of a wide-ranging “everything app" analysts say may never materialize

title: Before X, Twitter got its name from a dictionary
description: Elon Musk's Twitter is now X, as the social media platform changes its branding. But Twitter got its name using some decidedly old-school tools.

title: Job applicants are battling AI résumé filters with a hack
description: Candidates are stuffing their résumés with white font in hopes of avoiding being automatically rejected. But does it work?
